Sentence.value: When you are resting, keep your leg raised above the level of your heart to prevent leg swelling: - Lie down and place a pillow under the lower part of your leg.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: When you are [[resting|C0035253]], keep your leg raised above the level of your heart to prevent [[leg swelling|C0581394]]: - Lie down and place a pillow under the lower part of your leg.

Sentence.value: - Eat a heart-healthy diet, exercise, stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your stress.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Eat a heart-healthy diet, [[exercise|C0015259]], stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your [[stress|C0038435]].

Sentence.value: - If you are taking medicines for high blood pressure or diabetes, take them as you have been told to take them.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - If you are taking [[medicines|C0013227]] for [[high blood pressure|C0020538]] or [[diabetes|C0011847]], take them as you have been told to take them.

Sentence.value: - Your provider may ask you to take aspirin or a medicine called clopidogrel (Plavix) when you go home.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Your provider may ask you to take aspirin or a medicine called [[clopidogrel|C0070166]] ([[Plavix|C0633084]]) when you go home.
